Detailed Description

Implements basic all-or-nothing procedure for a given origin node.

Member Function Documentation

FPType AONUsual::calculateTravelTime ( const PairOD &  dest) const
protectedvirtual

Calculates travel time for a given O-D pair: demand multiplied by the shortest path distance between given O-D pair.

Parameters

Returns
total travel time for a given O-D pair.
